Name: Razumny (Разумный (Sensible))
Builder:
Shipyard No. 200 (named after 61 Communards), Nikolayev
Shipyard No. 202 (Dalzavod),Vladivostok
Renamed:
TsL-29, 6 February 1960
PKZ-3, 15 September 1960
SM-14, 23 October 1962
Reclassified:
As a target ship, 6 February 1960
As an accommodation ship, 15 September 1960
As a target ship, 23 October 1962
Displacement:
1,612 t (1,587 long tons) (standard)
2,039 t (2,007 long tons) (deep load)
Range: 2,720 nmi (5,040 km; 3,130 mi) at 19 knots (35 km/h; 22 mph)
Armament:
4 × single 130 mm (5.1 in) guns
2 × single 76.2 mm (3 in) AA guns
2 × single 45 mm (1.8 in) AA guns
2 × single 12.7 mm (0.50 in) AA machineguns
2 × triple 533 mm (21.0 in) torpedo tubes
60–95 mines
25 depth charges
